Implement REST API endpoints in Python on Linux using Docker Interface with SQL Server databases, HIVE, Kafka, Redis, MongoDb, ElasticSearch Communicate and interact with product managers and end users to create scalable services.Minimum 2 yearsâ€™ experience programming using Python and Docker on Linux.
